column2: BRIEF-TRI Pointe Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.28 April 25 (Reuters) - TRI Pointe Group Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $582.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $551.3 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ANTICIPATES ITS HOMEBUILDING GROSS MARGIN PERCENTAGE WILL BE IN A RANGE OF 21.0% TO 21.5% FOR Q2 * UPDATING ITS HOMEBUILDING GROSS MARGIN PERCENTAGE FOR FULL YEAR 2018 TO BE IN RANGE OF 21.0% TO 21.5% * BACKLOG UNITS AT QUARTER END OF 2,143 HOMES COMPARED TO 1,734, HOMES , AN INCREASE OF 24% FROM Q1 2017 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $551.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
